caption.p: Infection parameters of BALB/c peritoneal macrophages infected with Leishmania amazonensis and treated with Curcuma longa essential oil. Data represent mean ± standard deviation of two independent experiments realized in triplicate. ∗p<0.05 and ∗∗p<0.01 when compared with the untreated group by Kruskal-Wallis followed by Dunn's multiple comparisons test.
